content.raw:
@nkoenig 

Hi Nathan,

I was wondering how the cloud time for development is coming along? Unfortunately, we only have average spec laptops. They keep overheating, gazebo keeps crashing and the real time factor is 0.12 at best.

Would be good to know if we'll get some cloud time any time soon, otherwise we have to buy some in order to prevent development time loss. We could manage the first round, but with the new scenarios, we just struggle like pigs on skates.

Thank you for your answer.

Best,
Istvan
